longitude.description: A measure of how far west a house is; a higher value is farther west

latitude.description: A measure of how far north a house is; a higher value is farther north

housing_median_age.description: Median age of a house within a block; a lower number is a newer building

total_rooms.description: Total number of rooms within a block

total_bedrooms.description: Total number of bedrooms within a block

population.description: Total number of people residing within a block

households.description: Total number of households, a group of people residing within a home unit, for a block

median_income.description: Median income for households within a block of houses (measured in tens of thousands of US Dollars)

median_house_value.description: Median house value for households within a block (measured in US Dollars)

ocean_proximity.description: Location of the house w.r.t ocean/sea

value_dict.<1H OCEAN: House is less than an hour from the ocean

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing data, please predict the median house value.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted median house value is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in socio-economic data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing data, please predict the median income of the area.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in housing market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing data, please predict the median age of the houses.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted median age of the houses is ______.
